File Server Configuration Dialog Box

Use the File Server Configuration dialog box (Admin | File Servers) to tell Serena ChangeMan Version Manager clients which Version Manager File Server to use. To make use of this feature, you must have a functional Version Manager File Server.

Field Descriptions

File Servers list Version Manager searches starting from the top of this list. Select a server in this list to reposition, test, or delete.
Click to reposition the selected server in the File Servers list. Version Manager searches starting from the top of the list.
Click to delete the selected server from the list.
Click to add a server to the File Servers list. The Add File Server URL dialog box appears.
Click to edit the selected server URL. The Edit File Server URL dialog box appears.
Test Click to test the connection to the selected server.
Store server configuration information in Enter a path and file name (*.ini) in which to store server configuration information. To ease configuration for all users, setup the list of servers then place the configuration file on a network where all users can access it. Then the users need only specify the shared location of the configuration file to automatically populate their own File Servers list.
OK Click to apply the settings and close the dialog box.
